short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps InveeSync users to sync the app with Tally

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps InveeSync users to sync the app with Tally. It takes permission from the user to sync their data such as SO, PO, and Jobwork details to help sync their work across different applications.
